website_summaries.verdict: For in-game or practice, these football pants are designed for all around, long-lasting play.
pros: Great adjustable fit, with varying sizes
Made from material that's tight but comfortable
Comes in 9 colors, including black and white, so they work very well for practice and in-game
cons: The stitching will show signs of wear and tear, so they may need minor maintenance throughout a long season

customer_reviews.title: Yes they run small, but they are a great fit when you adjust for that.
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully before ordering you've read all of the reviews to realize the pants run small, but the pants are great when you make the adjustment to get a larger size. This is the second pair for my 8th grade son who is a girthy lineman. He's 5'8" and weighs 180 pounds with a 34 inch waist. The adult large is perfect for him. The other great thing about these pants is they hold up in the wash. I've read reviews about other pants that fall apart in the wash. I wash these several times a week on a hand wash setting and have had no problems whatsoever with the pads coming out or the material ripping. Still good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for taller individuals
customer_reviews.text: These pants were purchased to be used as game pants since the middle school did not have adult size pants in red. My son just turned 14 and is 6'4" and a trim 265#. Prior to receiving these pants he was wearing the school issued youth 3x pants and the waist line was way too short, so he could never get them pulled up far enough. It was painful to watch him adjust his pants every play. We received these pants sooner than expected and they fit perfect. I would recommend for anyone who is taller and needs a higher waist line.
customer_reviews.author: Russell T Marwitz

customer_reviews.title: Best integrated pants EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best quality long lasting pants for football. I bought another brand before finally finding these and they fell apart in the wash first time and wouldn't refund my $$. Now I will only buy Rawlings the kid LOVES them he says they are the most comfortable pants and I wash and dry them all the time with no fear unlike the lesser Augusta brand I previously made the mistake of buying.
customer_reviews.author: Happy2shop

customer_reviews.title: Wears very well, but fit is a few sizes small.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the adult 3X for my 14 year old GS and I first wondered if they were going to be too large, but by reading the other reviews I decided to go with the largest size. I'm glad that I did. They fit him perfectly. The quality is as good as any other uniform pants that we've had and the sheen of the material makes them look good.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Football Pants
customer_reviews.text: The pants held together good, but I was a little disappointed after the first wash when the stitching began coming out. It got progressively worse with each wash. It made the pads a little difficult to keep in place on some parts. Other than that, they were great. I have a 14 year old son that weighs 250 and they worked great for him.
customer_reviews.author: Michele McAmis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty damn good 😂
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love these pants so much they stayed up on me tightly no matter how many time a I fell on the Field I definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 12 yr old middle schooler. They are holding up well with daily 3hr practices.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Cranford

customer_reviews.title: Great football pants - but definitely run small!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these pants and I like them, too, because they are so easy to launder but read the other reviews about buying a larger size than you need! These definitely do run small. My son normally wears and XL sweat pant and a size 38 jean. I bought the XXL and the XXXL for him after reading the reviews. I was surprised to find that he needed the XXXL and I sent the XXL back.
customer_reviews.author: JP's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for costuming!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! As a performer, this really take my "football" looks to a new level and they are comfy to boot. In my more athletic on stage moments, these pads have also been a knee-saver.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Run small, my son normally wears a men's large and we had to buy xxl
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Held up well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson. They held up well and he loved the fact that he didn't have to mess with putting on the pads since they were already made into the pants. They were a little hard to wash because the pads made them float to the top of the water, but if you didn't have much in the washer it did OK. I would buy these again, but they are still in such good shape he will be able to wear them again next season.
customer_reviews.author: Easttxgranny

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know your size
customer_reviews.text: Just a lil hard to put on but still real good though
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a child's size that I got. I gave them away.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt J. Zimmerle

customer_reviews.title: Fits great & convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenage son. It makes football practice easier because he no longer has to switch out his pads into his game day pants. The pads are well-integrated with the pants, which makes washing them convenient. I bought a white pair last year and had to buy a black one this year because of this year's team requirements. So I'd definitely recommend them if you're willing to pay the price for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great for 275lb man I wear size 38" but ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits great for 275lb man I wear size 38" but ordered a XL which Rawlings states its a 42".....Fits great
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Great Pants
customer_reviews.text: There was some confusion on the price, but Amazon came through for me! It is very hard to find pants that will fit my son locally and these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: KLB

customer_reviews.title: Well made, washes easy
customer_reviews.text: These integrated football pants wash easily and do not stain. They are well made. The only drawback to these pants--and other brands, too--is that you have to order a larger size than you might expect to get a big enough waist. That means that they don't fit tight on the legs and the pads can slide around a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Tom In Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rawlings F4500P Integrated Football Pants
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! Absolutely the best quality and is very comfortable and allows for flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit and stuff
customer_reviews.text: Pants fit me and I have a 40" waist. I wish I didn't need to cut them open to remove the pads. I am striving for ways to make them more comfortable while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Met all expectations. Are holding up well. Look good and fit well. Glad we got them ...easy to wash
customer_reviews.author: wolverinescott

customer_reviews.title: Great but buy a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: I followed the other reviews and bought one size more and they fit perfect i love them hope to have them for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Juan Diego Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: The product fitted perfectly, my son is 13 about ...
customer_reviews.text: The product fitted perfectly, my son is 13 about 120lbs. Delivery was on time, the price was right, product exactly as described. I have absolutely nothing negative to say..
customer_reviews.author: Leilani

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: some seams did not hold past the first couple of practices and games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but overall a great pair and size is good for us
customer_reviews.text: After about a month of use the stitching is coming out in the pads, but overall a great pair and size is good for us. My son wears a 38-40 waist pant and has big thighs. They fit him great! This is the only football pants that fit my son. I even bought another brand of 4X that were too small. Whatever material these are made from stretches great. Same pants that we bought last year...the only one that fits larger frames.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly comfortable. I'm a 31x32 and the adult medium fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for Halloween. Fairly comfortable. I'm a 31x32 and the adult medium fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Rent

customer_reviews.title: ... is big for his age and these pants fit great! They lasted the whole season
customer_reviews.text: My son is big for his age and these pants fit great! They lasted the whole season! Will be buying them again for next year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit well, wash well
customer_reviews.text: My son has a 30 in inseam and a 34 waste. These fit nicely with room for next year. Go through washer and dryer without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pants fit great!!! My son said they are super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they were great for my seventh grade son. very durable throughout the season.
customer_reviews.author: James Staton

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who is playing tackle football. I really liked them because they did not have any laces to deal with and the belt is integrated so it does not slip out. They are very durable and he says they are comfortable. Even the white cleans up nicely from grass stains!
customer_reviews.author: Celise Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great quality although a little tight compared to a pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality although a little tight compared to a pair of black I previously had bought. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Ornelas

customer_reviews.title: Great product on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Needed some game pants quick due to military cuts not every person could get pads this year. Bought these for super cheap and they fit great. Super protective, nice belt, and very snug. They also look more expensive than they are! I'm 6'1 205 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Cummings

customer_reviews.title: and my son loved them.
customer_reviews.text: I listened to the reviews and ordered a size larger. They fit perfectly, and my son loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality with reasonable price. A gift for friend and he likes it. Suit the need. The integrated pants are far more convenient than pants and pads.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Football Practice Pants
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, well made, but these definitely run small. They also are difficult to wash because they float to the top of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: TMLeen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping and received exactly what was described. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Get wht size you wear in joggers cause their are bigger than you think but other than that they have built in knee and thigh pads as well as hip pads
customer_reviews.author: D'Angelo Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair I bought for my son
customer_reviews.text: These pants are great/wash very well and hold up to the grime of football, highly recommend these to any parent of a football player
customer_reviews.author: Robert Walraven

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: If you use football pants then these are and excellent buy for the money. They are sturdy and durable and are easy to maintain. An excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: F-14TommyToro

customer_reviews.title: Good new pants, do not run small
customer_reviews.text: I was worried reading here they run small. They don't. They run big or at least true to size. But the pants are good, name brand.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: High Quality...and maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Nearly impossible to clean! I spend extra time with shout and a toothbrush just to get them somewhat clean looking. They float in the washing machine so unless you really pretreat them well...or your player doesn't get very dirty...they will not wash properly. They fit well and are high quality. But for the price I paid, it's a nuisance to spend so much time cleaning them!
customer_reviews.author: Puddles

customer_reviews.title: Good practice pants
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He uses it for his high school football practices. It is a good product for this purpose
customer_reviews.author: FamilyMan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Size was very small and not comparable to other companies.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good pic!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and very durable. Would definitely re-order this product. Very resonably priced, too. Would reccommend to another football player!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Simple Thank's
customer_reviews.text: The material is realy nice, the size is perfect and the protection is confortable. Thank's for this product and price.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Linares

customer_reviews.title: decieving
customer_reviews.text: CRAP!!!!!!!!!! i thought it was an adult size. actually itis youth. i orderd an xxl and it fits like a small! it says ADULT! i ordered of my iphone and it didnt show the information at all!
customer_reviews.author: NTB3

Pads include hip, spine, thigh, and Knee
Lycra body with elastic waistband help create a more comfortable fit
